titles.title: I Walk In The Heavenlies With Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I walk in the heavenlies with Jesus,
All earthly cares left behind.
Seated at the right hand of the Master,
All authority and power is mine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So set your affections on things from above,
With Christ at the right hand of God.
For ye are dead and your new life is hid,
In Christ, at the right hand of God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yo ando en los cielos con Cristo.
Lo terrenal queda atras.
Sentado a la diestra del Maestro,
De vencer y reinar soy capaz.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Poned vuestra mira en las cosas celestiales,
Con Cristo a la diestra de Dios.
Pues, ya estais muertos y escondida vuestra vida,
En Cristo a la diestra de Dios.
